brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study was to study seasonal inter-individual and intra-individual
      variations in S-25(OH)D and to explore parameters associated with S-25-OHD in healthy
      Swedish adults.

clinical_study.brief_title: Seasonal Variations in Serum 25-hydroxy Vitamin-D Levels in a Swedish Cohort

detailed_description.textblock:
Serum was collected during 12 months and analysed for 25(OH)D in 540 healthy blood donors.
      The blood donors answered questionnaires concerning vitamin D supplements, smoking, physical
      activity, sunbed use and holidays in sunny locations. Repeated serum samples were also
      collected from thrombocyte donors to study the intra-individual variations in S-25(OH)D.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  healthy at the time of donating blood

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  unhealthy

clinical_study.official_title: Seasonal Variations in Serum 25-hydroxy Vitamin-D Levels in a Swedish Cohort

primary_outcome.measure: Inter-individual and intra-individual varations in serum 25-hydroxy vitamin-D during different seasons.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Group1:Blood donors, single test, 25(OH)vit D at inclusion .  Group 2: thrombocyte donors: multiple tests, serum 25(OH)vit D during 8 months.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Cross-Sectional
